Package ball.maven.plugins.license

ball-license-maven-plugin Mojos.

dev.hcf.ball:ball-license-maven-plugin

License Maven Plugin

GoalPhaseDescription
generate-license-resourcesgenerate-resources

org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo to generate LICENSE and DEPENDENCIES resources. {@injected.fields} {@maven.plugin.fields} {@bean.info}

help

Display help information on ball-license-maven-plugin. Call mvn ball-license:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

update-project-licenseinitialize

org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo to update project LICENSE. {@injected.fields} {@maven.plugin.fields}

Author:
Allen D. Ball
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DefaultMethods
    Common default utility methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLicenseMojo
    Abstract base class for license Mojos.
    ArtifactLicenseCatalog
    Artifact to LicenseSet (License) Map implementation.
    ArtifactModelCache
    Artifact to Model Map implementation.
    ExecutorServiceImpl
    Singleton ExecutorService (ThreadPoolExecutor).
    GenerateLicenseResourcesMojo
    Mojo to generate LICENSE and DEPENDENCIES resources.
    LicenseConverter
    AnyLicenseInfo ConfigurationConverter.
    LicenseMap
    Map implementation that relates SPDX ID and known aliases to License sourced from ListedLicenses.getListedLicenses().
    LicenseMojoComponentConfigurator
    License Mojo ComponentConfigurator.
    LicenseResolver
    AnyLicenseInfo resolver with methods to parse, look-up, and normalize.
    LicenseUtilityMethods
    AnyLicenseInfo utility methods.
    Selection
    <selection/> parameter.
    TextLicenseInfo
    ExtractedLicenseInfo implementation.
    UpdateProjectLicenseMojo
    Mojo to update project LICENSE.
    URLLicenseInfo
    URL ExtractedLicenseInfo implementation.
    URLLicenseInfoParser
    URL (String representation) to AnyLicenseInfo Map implementation.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Retain
    Annotation to prevent javac from discarding package-info.class.
